data.name: 怨灵小僵-“灵婚—顾江·绛袍砗磲帽”服饰（外传剧情皮肤）
data.detailed_description:
Grief Ling Little Stiffness - "Ling Marriage - Gu Jiang Jiang's Inkstone Hat" costume (the skin of the plot) contains Grief Ling Little Stiffness "Quilt Garment and Inkstone Hat" costume to be unlocked permanently.

Attached:

1. External story "Lingzhi" complete version, soul makeup function page view.

2. The voice version of the outgoing story "Ling Marriage" is expected to be heard after April 8.

3. The wedding gift given by Liu Lier and Gu Jiang includes 29999 spiritual coins.



"Make up and whisper to my husband-in-law. Is the eyebrow deep and shallow?

A deep mountain in the territory of Weiqing is just the third day, and then came Suona's song to greet his relatives, which echoes in the misty path. Obscure can see a marrying team, until the team approached, it was recognized that marrying is different from the usual. The first one was a single row of Suonas. Behind the line, where the big red sedan chair was supposed to be, lay a coffin, which was carried by four young men. The coffin body was painted red and hot with gold patterns. On the front of the coffin was a pair of Mandarin ducks, which were vividly carved.

On the side of the team, there was also a child with a pendulum, his face full of joy, holding a basket of flowers. In the basket, instead of the petals commonly used for marrying relatives, they are the withered and wrinkled money.

Not long afterwards, the procession stopped outside a house beside the city wall. The door of the house was wide open, and there was a happy word on each of the two wooden doors. The house is a spacious courtyard with a long red cloth on the ground, which leads directly to the ancestral hall opposite. A row of red lanterns with happy characters were hung on the beams on both sides of the Zongtang.

Looking at the hall again, it is not like a happy hall for receiving relatives, but rather like a spiritual hall. There are two coffin racks in the hall, only one coffin, which is a little bigger than the one outside the hall. Two elderly couples, wearing shackles and kneeling in front of the coffin, had a strange scene.

At this time, a Taoist monk came out of the hall and shouted out at the door, "Bride is here!"

After hearing this, the four guys outside the house carried the coffin and went into the hall along the red cloth. They put the coffin on the other coffin shelf steadily, took the reward and hurried away without looking back.

Then the Taoist priest came forward and took the place of the bride and groom from his arms and placed them in front of the two coffins. Another red thread was taken from the cuff, and the two sets of cards were bolted together with red and yellow silk and satin.

Afterwards, the Taoist priest stood aside, and the two parents straightened up and hugged each other to show their marriage.

At the end of the ceremony, the four men retired to a side room, ate a wedding banquet, drank a wedding wine, and only a few days later two coffins were buried together. This spiritual marriage was even married.

To ask about the origin of the bride and groom in this family affair, it has to start 20 years ago.



The complete story can be unlocked by purchasing DLC.

fullgame.name: 探灵笔记/拾遗记-1V5(Notes of Soul)

data.supported_languages:
Simplified Chinese*, Traditional Chinese*
*languages with full audio support

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7, Windows 8.1,Windows10
  • Processor: Intel Core i3-4170 / AMD FX-8120
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 460 1GB或AMD HD 6850 1GB
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 14 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 7, Windows 8.1,Windows10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-6600K / AMD Ryzen 5 1600
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 960 2GB / AMD Radeon R7 370 2GB
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 14 MB available space
